title: Social Media’s Front-Row Seat to Russia’s Invasion of Ukraine
sub_head: Students discuss how seeing the violence and chaos caused by Putin’s aggression has changed their understanding of war.
body: Editor’s note: In this Future View students discuss the war in Ukraine. Next week we’ll ask, “Is college censorship real? Does fear of backlash from administrators and fellow students encourage self-censoring of views and opinions?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before March 15. The best responses will be published that night.
